div.p: Received of John McAdoo one Hundred and fifty dollars in full payment of a Negroe Boy named Calloway. I do hereby warrant and defend the Right and title of Said Boy for Ever Given. Under my hand and seal this 2 day of October 1837 John Gibbs seal
